COMMENT_TX: $this is the first time two NL West teams have met in the NLCS
$the ball rolled a little into foul territory and then returned across the line, hitting the 3B bag

$Jason Upton called for interference with Kaz Matsui at 2B; Augie Ojeda called out; Upton pushed off the bag towards 3B and rolled through Matsui, knocking him down; Chris Snyder sent back to 2B; fans started booing and then some threw bottles onto the field; Rockies manager Clint Hurdle pulled his team off the field while it was cleared of debris; eight-minute delay
$Miguel Montero overslid 2B and was tagged out
$the throw pulled the shortstop off the bag; Stephen Drew thought he was out and started to jog off the field; Shortstop threw to 3B where Drew was tagged out
$Chris Young broke too soon, Franklin Morales stepped off, ran at him and tagged him halfway to second
